What is the purpose of the `resendwallettransactions` command in Verus?

The `resendwallettransactions` command is intended for testing purposes only. It immediately re-broadcasts unconfirmed wallet transactions to all peers. Normally, the wallet code periodically re-broadcasts automatically, making this command unnecessary for regular use.

resendwallettransactions Immediately re-broadcast unconfirmed wallet transactions to all peers. Intended only for testing; the wallet code periodically re-broadcasts automatically. Returns array of transaction ids that were re-broadcast.
